Traits.Name: Angelic Weapons
Traits.Content: The archon's weapon attacks are magical. When the archon hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

Traits.Name: Axiomatic Mind
Traits.Content: The archon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its understanding of justice.

Traits.Name: Innate Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components: At will: detect evil and good 1/day each: destructive wave, geas

Traits.Name: Magic Resistance
Traits.Content: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Traits.Name: One Being
Traits.Content: Though it appears as a humanoid creature riding a mount, an archon is a single being. The "rider" can't be dismounted, and no other means can separate the two portions of the archon's being short of its death.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The archon makes two attacks: one with its sword and one with its claws.

Actions.Name: Sword
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

Actions.Name: Claws
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

Traits.Name: Pounce
Traits.Content: If the felidar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claws attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the felidar can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

Traits.Name: Innate Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The felidar's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The felidar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:At will: detect evil and good, light, thaumaturgy1/day each: calm emotions, daylight, dispel evil and good

Traits.Name: Magic Resistance
Traits.Content: The felidar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Traits.Name: Magic Weapons
Traits.Content: The felidar's weapon attacks are magical.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The felidar makes two attacks with its claws.

Actions.Name: Claws
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
Actions.Content: The felidar touches another creature with its horns. The target magically regains 11 (2d8+2) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target

Actions.Name: Teleport (1/Day)
Actions.Content: The felidar magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the felidar is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

Traits.Name: Amphibious
Traits.Content: The kraken can breathe air and water.

Traits.Name: Innate Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The kraken's innate spellcasting ability is

Traits.Name: Charisma (spell save DC 17)
Traits.Content: The kraken can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:3/day each: control weather, water breathing

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The kraken makes two attacks: one with its claw and one with its tentacles.

Actions.Name: Claw
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6+9) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Tentacles
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6+9) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained.

Actions.Name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5â€“6)
Actions.Content: The kraken hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
